room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Detroit
review: Had a wonderful experience. I was told The President's Bunker was one of the harder rooms but I enjoyed it. It was challenging but still fun and mentally stimulating. Andrew was a great host as well.

room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Detroit
review: I've done three escape rooms with the Great Escape in Royal Oak, and the Presidential Bunker has been my favorite so far! Our game master Chelsea was extremely nice and made the experience even better. Can't wait to go back!
